title: Nice time
creator_credit: Alain Tanner, Claude Goretta and British Film Institute
brief_description: A notable experimental documentary featuring the sights and sounds of Piccadilly Circus on a Saturday night. Music by Chas McDevitt Skiffle Group. Cinematography and sound by John Fletcher.
creator_credit_for_label: Alain Tanner, Claude Goretta and British Film Institute
